body:
Well, it is open source, so just read the source...

The cloud provider starts waiting for the vmware tools to finish in _wait_for_ip. The provider needs to get an IP address to be able to additionally bootstrap salt afterwards. Obviously this makes the vmware tools necessary for the provider to do it's job. The provider does not try to install the tools for you at this point!

I've decided to set up initial templates for each OS which come along with the tools already installed.

Afterwards i'll ensure upgrading the tools either by the cloud provider, or using states. Need to test the provider way.
title: How to control vmware tools installation with salt-cloud using vmware provider
